data.title: Rates & Getaways
data.meta_description: The Cole Porter Inn located in Peru, Indiana features three suites - the Cole Porter Suite, the Anything Goes Suite, and the Night & Day Suite. Each suite has a kitchen with microwave and refrigerator, private bathroom, sitting room, sun room, cable TV, and high speed internet service.
data.text:
Cole Porter Inn Rates and Getaways

Standard Rate: $92.00 – $118.00/night (please check calendar)

Multi-night discount available (call directly with any questions)

Sideways Getaway

Enjoy the high life in Miami County! Relish a stay at the historic and elegant Cole Porter Inn, then play a round of golf at the award winning Rock Hollow Golf Course. After socializing on the green, take just a short drive to Converse and visit the Oak Hill Winery.

Romantic Getaway

You and your sweetheart can start your day at the Oak Hill Winery in Converse tasting their wide selection of fine wines. Your second destination will take place at McClure’s Winery and Orchard, where the tastes of the season are abundant. Then have dinner at one of Peru’s finest restaurants. End your luxurious day with even more alone time with your sweetie at the Cole Porter Inn. We offer an atmosphere at the Cole Porter Inn that is sure to inspire romance. The Cole Porter Suite is elegant, regal, and elevates love and desire, much in the same way Mr. Porter mentions in several of his well-known songs.

Theater Getaway

Experience the life of a star! Enjoy a stay at the historic and elegant Cole Porter Inn. Take in dinner, then attend a production by one of the finest community theaters around. The Ole Olsen Memorial Theater housed in the Historic Peru Depot gives its audience up close attention and offers intimacy that is lacking in larger theaters. Whether the show is comical, seasonal, or inspired by our very own Cole Porter, you’re sure to feel a member of this delightful cast and well-loved Peru attraction.

Museum Getaway

Take in history, fun, and find out the hard work put into Miami County by visiting all of our museums in one day! Enjoy a stay at the historic and elegant Cole Porter Inn. Visit four of the county’s exciting museums, including the Grissom Air Museum, Miami County Museum, Circus City Festival Museum, and the International Circus Hall of Fame.
